parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Path and filename of file to insert as an Attachment to this document

parameters.name: Linked
parameters.description: True to link the document to the file, false to not

title: IModelDocExtension.InsertAttachment
description: Inserts a file as an Attachment to this document.
signature:
System.Boolean InsertAttachment( 
   System.String
FileName
,
   System.Boolean
Linked
)

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Path and filename of file to insert as an Attachment to this document

parameters.name: Linked
parameters.description: True to link the document to the file, false to not

returns: True if the file is inserted as an Attachment, false if not
